description: This light filled two bedroom two bath is perfect for a visit to Brooklyn. 5 minutes walking distance to the F/G at Prospect Park stop, and just the same to the wonderful park which boasts hiking trails, & places to picnic. South Slope has plenty of great bars and restaurants. Feel free to bring your pet to enjoy a nice movie night on the couch, or even breakfast on the balcony. Perfect for 2/3 people.
name: Bright Cozy Apartment next to Prospect Park
review:
Gracelyn was a fantastic host! While we never met in person, her communication was perfect leading up to our arrival and during our stay.

Everything was exactly as described, but still exceeded our expectations. The neighborhood is very charming and a 5 min walk to the F/G train.

Would HIGHLY recommend Gracelyn!
